mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM COMMUNITY JOIN COMPANY ON COMMUNITY.COMPANY_ID = COMPANY.ID JOIN SYS_USERS ON COMPANY.DEVELOPER_ID = SYS_USERS.USER_ID WHERE SYS_USERS.USER_ID=#{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND COMPANY.STATUS=2 AND COMMUNITY.STATUS=2
